titleStmt.title: Of sudden diseases. By Dr. John Pechey of the College of Physicians, London, at his house in Robin-Hood's-Court, the Lower End of Bowlane, near Bazing-Lane, Cheapside
titleStmt.author: Pechey, John, 1655-1716.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Wellcome Institute for the History of Medicine, London.
